enrl_requirement:
Enrollment Requirements: Co-Requisite: Students must also register for Chemistry 210-2 02.
Add both classes to the shopping cart and submit together for successful registration.
title: WCAS CHEM 230-2-02 Organic Chemistry Lab I

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value:
Instruction in experimental techniques of modern organic chemistry emphasizing chemical separations, spectroscopic characterization, and reactions of alkanes, alkenes, alkyl halides, alcohols, carbonyls, esters, and aromatic compounds.

Chemistry 230-2 is the laboratory course associated with Chemistry 210-2. Students enrolled in Chemistry 210-2 must also enroll in Chemistry 230-2.

descriptions.name: Registration Requirements
descriptions.value: Prerequisite: Grade of C- or better in Chemistry 210-1

descriptions.name: Class Materials (Required)
descriptions.value:
1. Turning Technologies Response Card Model QT or NXT ("Clicker")

Items Below Available From The Chemistry Department:

2. 100% Cotton Laboratory Coat
3. Laboratory Safety Glasses

Sales Details Will Be Announced Prior to Course Start

subject: CHEM
